cast.name: Anton du Beke Anton du Beke

this_title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily Season 1
trans_title: 西西里奇遇 第一季
introduction: Anton and Giovanni explore the sun kissed island of Sicily. Checking out everything from the famous volcano of Mount Etna to tiny old towns. The lucky pair will also sample Sicily's cuisine and indulge in the odd tango or two.
chinese_title: 西西里奇遇 第一季
foreign_title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily Season 1
